parameter.value: Hello |PLAYERNAME|. Do you want to buy any spell runes?
You do not have enough money.
Is |TOTALCOST| gold coins too much for you? Get out of here!
I am the seller of runes and magic items.
My name is Fenech. Why do you ask?
I sell wands (vortex, dragonbreath, plague, cosmic energy and inferno), rods (snakebite, moonlight, volcanic, quagmire and tempest), runes (support, attack and cure) and magic items.
I sell magic wall and paralize
I sell heavy magic missile, great fireball, explosion and sudden death.
I sell lightwand, mana fluid, life fluid and blank runes.
